title: The Third Post
content: No! The cat shelter's on to me. Meh. Man, I'm sore all over. I feel like I just went ten rounds with mighty Thor. But, like most politicians, he promised more than he could deliver. Humans dating robots is sick. You people wonder why I'm still single? It's 'cause all the fine robot sisters are dating humans!
